Posts.Content: Hi, Can you tell me the difference between letrozole and Femera? Thx
Posts.Title: Letrozole..... Femara brand

Posts.Content: Thank you Ellen, I'm Keeping my fingers crossed it's here to stay... Hearing your experience gives me hope   Xx
Posts.Title: Hair growth on Taxol

Posts.Content: Hi,  I have had a bi- lateral masectomy. 4 sessions of A/C chemo and am now on my 3rd session of Taxol 6 more to go. My hair has started to grow back, has anyone else found this happening and is it here to stay? Keeping my fingers crossed !
Posts.Title: Hair growth on Taxol

Posts.Content: Thank you Julia, I am just confused as it is quite strong, I suppose I'll take it day by day. Like you said post chemo it will grow back...so looking forward to that day  Xx
Posts.Title: Hair growth on Taxol

Posts.Content: I am currently in my second weekly dose of Taxol. I'm feeling very breathless has anyone else suffered this side effect?
Posts.Title: Taxol side effects

Posts.Content: Hi, I have been fully checked even an ECG and chest X-ray. My Oncologist has said he will be keeping a close eye.  Thank you for the reply
